SQL.LOAD:
SELECT manufacturer_id, model, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, company_group_id FROM elp_mfg_coverage
WHERE mfg_coverage_id = :mfg_coverage_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT mfgc.mfg_coverage_id, mfr.description manufacturer, mfr.manufacturer_id, mfgc.model, mfgc.risk_type_id, mfgc.mfg_warranty FROM elp_mfg_coverage mfgc, elp_manufacturer mfr WHERE mfr.company_group_Id = :company_group_id and mfr.manufacturer_id = mfgc.manufacturer_id
--dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY UPPER(manufacturer)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_mfg_coverage SET manufacturer_id = :manufacturer_id, model = :model, modified_by = :modified_by, risk_type_id = :risk_type_id, mfg_warranty = :mfg_warranty, company_group_id = :company_group_id WHERE mfg_coverage_id = :mfg_coverage_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_mfg_coverage ( manufacturer_id, model, created_by, deduct_by_mfg_id, risk_type_id, mfg_warranty ) VALUES ( :manufacturer_id, :model, :created_by, :deduct_by_mfg_id, :risk_type_id, :mfg_warranty )
